about_the_game:
Welcome to SYSTEMCRASH92, an exciting survival crafting game with RPG elements that captures the essence of classic arcade games!

Explore portals filled with enemies of varying levels while gathering minerals to craft new weapons. Each portal presents a unique challenge, culminating in epic boss battles. The more you play, the stronger you become: level up, improve your skills, and dominate a world full of action.

Designed for fans of leveling, crafting, and screen-shaking attacks, SYSTEMCRASH92 combines fast-paced gameplay with a fun style.

Ready for action? Dare to clear the portals and prove your power!
detailed_description:
Welcome to SYSTEMCRASH92, an exciting survival crafting game with RPG elements that captures the essence of classic arcade games!

Explore portals filled with enemies of varying levels while gathering minerals to craft new weapons. Each portal presents a unique challenge, culminating in epic boss battles. The more you play, the stronger you become: level up, improve your skills, and dominate a world full of action.

Designed for fans of leveling, crafting, and screen-shaking attacks, SYSTEMCRASH92 combines fast-paced gameplay with a fun style.

Ready for action? Dare to clear the portals and prove your power!
legal_notice: For the creation of SYSTEMCRASH92, Unreal® Engine was used. Unreal® is a registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and the rest of the world. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 -2023, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.
name: SYSTEMCRASH 92

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD® FX-6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 sound device
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: Microsoft Xbox ® Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 sound device
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: Microsoft Xbox ® Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) recommended

short_description: SYSTEMCRASH92 is a survival crafting game with RPG elements and replayability through portals filled with enemies and bosses.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
